website_summaries.verdict: This is a solid choice if you like the idea of the accessory kit and only need 1 flashlight.
pros: Combines a bright LED flashlight with a complete kit that includes a battery, charger, and case
Has 5 modes, including SOS and strobe
cons: Battery doesn't hold a charge as long as some other models on our list

customer_reviews.title: Bright and long lasting flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much from this flashlight but after I got the 18650 battery charged up it was a bright light. The first night I used it for a little over 5 hours and the light only decreased in brightness a little bit. The flashlight was a lot brighter with the 18650 then with the 3 aaa batteries. Overall I think for everything that comes with the flashlight it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Not a cheap light at all very durable
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to do a review but here it is now. I gave these as presents and the guys ALL LOVED THEM....they are very nice and the case is a PLUS....
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan

customer_reviews.title: None of the descriptions are overstated.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first TAC light and I'm very pleased with it. The amount of light given off is unbelievable! I always believe commercials and advertising exaggerates massively, but this is one instance when nothing is overstated! I especially appreciate the carrying case. It fits perfectly inside the door pocket of our car should we need it for emergencies. Will be ordering a couple more for other uses.
customer_reviews.author: teachernomore

customer_reviews.title: Night time--No problem!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a property manager for city apartments. I manage several buildings and I am called out at night several times a week. I have an LED flashlight in my truck, but it is not bright enough for me to see model numbers on some of the equipment. This LED tactical flashlight is a dream come true. One thing I really like about it is the fact that it is rechargeable. I never have to look for batteries. It is so bright that I can see behind all of the apartments and down into the alleyways. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert N. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mag LED that I thought was very bright but compared to this it's very dim. Unreal how bright this light is. Bought 2 more for my son's for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rankin

customer_reviews.title: This is an exceptional product.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that this flashlight allows you to expand the lighted area. I was a little disappointed that in the expanded area it was not as illuminated as it appeared in the TV advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: mississippigirl58

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: Great flashlight. The first time I used it was to go out to the mailbox after dark. Living out in the country you never know what is out and about. Heard the rustle and shined the light and could clearly see the possum as it scurried up the tree. I had it so it was shining wide but when I took the picture made the beam narrower. I would have missed this little creature without the flashlight
customer_reviews.author: LANITA

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FLASHLIGHT
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is pretty neat. I have bought flashlights from Home Depot, Lowes, and this flashlight is way better. It's small size is a benefit but don't let the small size fool you it packs a punch in light! First night I got it I turned out the lights in my living room and clicked the on button. Bam......my living room was lighted like the runway at an airport. Super bright. I clicked through the other modes and again impressed. The price is also a plus. Buy this you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: April L. Litts

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Have!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible flashlight! Great for walking dogs. Beam has a great distance!
customer_reviews.author: GSam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Bright
customer_reviews.text: I live the heart of thick Texas woods. This flashlight is so amazing. I have a chicken pen about 30 yards from my back deck. so at night things like to visit. I’ve been able to spotlight animals running around and scare them away bc of this flashlight. It worked so well I bought my dad one for deer hunting season back in November. The case is just a nice upgrade. I’d recommend this to anyone. I’m probably going to buy another one for my car. Perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnna

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and a great price. They sent a PDFs owners manual even before it arrived. Clicking the on/off switch changes modes but turns the flashlight off between modes, something they don't mention. Don't spend the extra money for those supposedly "military" flashlights at about four or five times the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson G

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting charge
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light the holds a charge for a long time. Fully charged it when I first got it and use it a few minutes a day 6 days a week and it hasn't had to be recharged after 4 weeks. I have no need of the strobe features so ne comments on that. My only problem with the flashlight is that the battery has to be removed to be recharged. It would be nice if the whole light could just be plugged in to recharge without having to remove the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Green

customer_reviews.title: Dad Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my dad and he absolutely loves it! Incredibly bright and efficient, I love that it is rechargeable and can use batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Robinson

customer_reviews.title: ... that this comes with the battery and charger is amazing. The battery itself is another 8-12 dollars depending ...
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this comes with the battery and charger is amazing. The battery itself is another 8-12 dollars depending on what brand you buy but this bundles it all together for you. Its primarily gonna be placed in the car in case i ever need to use it. I just might get another one for the household use.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This package comes with everything you need to keep your flashlight safe and charged, it's so bright I could see the reflective insignia of the airline above. Jk! Also good for self defense, giving you an 5-10 second advantage! If your looking for a flashlight to purchase, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Spoken Truth

customer_reviews.title: Pros: -Really Bright -Great Price -Comes with a fully ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Really Bright -Great Price -Comes with a fully charged battery + charger -Comes with an alternate battery unit as a back up (takes 3 AAA batteries) -Two separate methods of powering the flashlight is a huge benefit IMO. -Comes in a nifty case. Con: The self defense bezel feels too light, and appears too rounded IMO. Whish it was a bit heavier/rugged for self defense situations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My light is bright
customer_reviews.text: It's bright it's small enough to fit in my pocket. The price was right. It's hard not to light it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hartman

customer_reviews.title: There are way better options out there.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this flashlight and an Anker flashlight at the same time. Tested both out. Anker is much brighter with a very clean and clear light output. PeakPlus flashlight isn't bad...but it's not great. The included standard AAA battery holder doesn't work. Which was the main reason I bought this flashlight. If not I would have bought another Anker flashlight. The battery charger looks really cheap and sketchy. I wouldn't use it. The case is just a gimmick. Wish they would have spent the money from the case to make a belt pouch, a working standard battery holder, or a better battery charger. Flashlight works though. There are way better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because the flashlight is physically bigger than I expected. Re-reading the product page, the dimensions are listed though. The flashlight also doesn't have a "flash" function where the light comes one with a partial press of the switch. You have to press the switch all the way in to activate the light and then press it again to turn it off. A minor thing, but something I wanted, but it can't do. That said, this is a great flashlight for the price. The packaging that comes with it is very nice. And the seller is very responsive. The flashlight functions very well and is bright. I do recommend it for those that don't need the functions/size mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: M. Deibler

customer_reviews.title: Great little light.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my wife and me. Really works great. Recycled the battery that came with it as the whole charging thing is terrible. Using good AAA batteries is the way to go. They seem to last me months between replacement. I just use one setting (bright) and it works just fine for getting around in the dark. The focus adjustment seems to function well and can put a lot of light on a small area. Reused the case for small computer parts. Can't see much of a use for it otherwise. The strap is just fabric covered fishing line. Wife already broke hers. Looking for a substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Mao Xifaji

customer_reviews.title: Received today, and Have to say I am impressed ...
customer_reviews.text: Received today, and Have to say I am impressed, My husband turned off the lights in the kitchen and outside light, he shined it through the window and started laughing, we have two black doxies and it lit of the whole back yard, He had no clue I had let the boys out., such an added bonus to get the carry case and charger with this flash light, Its just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal, for battery, light, and charger! (plus a cheap case, LOL!)
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, everything as advertised! Used one of the lights already, very nice, bright! My only complaint is that the case is very cheap, but STILL 5 stars! The snaps/clips (on the case) are not going to last long, IMO, but not a big negative. THE TORCH: GREAT VALUE! Great Price! I strongly recommend :D
customer_reviews.author: Big Rob

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, this is the flashlight you will reach for when needed.
customer_reviews.text: The Peakplus Super Bright Led Flashlight is awesome. A user can wash a broad area with light and focus the beam in on a small area with brilliant bright light. It is idea for using a broad light pattern to light up a big area, and with one quick motion you can focus down the light beam to spot a running dog cutting through the brush in the distance for example. You can not do that with a regular kind of flashlight. It is the light I depend on with keeping my family safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mark gregory

customer_reviews.title: A contender in a crowded field
customer_reviews.text: Lots of flashlights have similar features to this, some are much more expensive! I noted the very high count of positive reviews and took a chance. Pleasantly surprised by the quality, especially for the asking price. Very pleasantly surprised with the replacement guarantee. If the seller will stand behind that warranty I will stand behind the seller. I am tired of expensive flashlights that give up the ghost way too soon to meet expectations. These failures are not depleted batteries but hardware, or electronic in nature. Why is it so hard to make a good flashlight. I give this seller and opportunity to impress. First impressions are hopeful!
customer_reviews.author: P. Prince

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: It took months for me to review this, mostly because I threw this product away shortly after buying it and then forgot about it until I saw it again recently. My experience, just a few weeks after purchasing I noticed corrosion building inside the battery compartment even though I had never used it in rainy weather. Within 2 months it began turning on only if I tapped it repeatedly and eventually after that it just didn't turn on at all. Wasn't even worth attempting a return or replacement. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: george r

customer_reviews.title: Toss it in the junk heap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flashlight for its zoom feature and the zoom lens fell out in the first week I had it so now its basically useless. The bright side is now I will have a spare battery for the next flashlight I buy ... from a different manufacturer because, well, this one is junk. Not nearly as bright as advertised, either. NOT a legitimate item.
customer_reviews.author: Legitimate Items

customer_reviews.title: Best Light Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Tactical Flashlight I've purchased so far. I like the rechargeable battery and the light is as bright or brighter than the others that I've bought. I own about nine of these tactical type lights. I have them in all the cars and in many of the rooms of my house. Having one nearby in the basement and garage is great. The smallest beam is square, but it illuminates the area brightly. I'm not sure why people would complain about the square light. If I needed another tactical flashlight, I'd buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: DooWopFan

customer_reviews.title: Good Flashlight-Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased at least 10 of these as gifts for family members. I use mine nearly every night to inspect the yard and vehicles before bed time. I love the rechargable battery as well. It has a 3 AAA holder that comes with kit too. I keep that holder ready with batteries in case I forget to charge the main rechargeable one because of laziness. :) Heavy duty aluminum case, dropped it on 2 occasions with no damage to light output function, only scratches to the paint on the case. I really like this flashlight and would not hesitate to purchase again. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really is super bright
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I didn't build my expectations too high about this tactical flashlight. But, WOW! I am impressed!!! This flashlight lights up my entire front yard on wide-beam mode, and gets an incredible amount of distance on the narrow-beam mode. I was never a big believer in LED flashlights until I purchased this one. It's extremely durable, too. It really is super bright. And, the handy charger takes up very little space when plugged in due to its narrow design. A fantastic buy for the money and I highly recommend it for anyone wanting a really bright flashlight without paying an extremely high price for similar products offered on television.
customer_reviews.author: ScottLanter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is everything it was advertised to be: great lighting, easy to fit in a pocket, multiple zoom and lighting choices. I use it to take late night walks with my dog and it's perfect; I feel much safer moving through dark neighborhoods.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time and they work well. One of the cases came cracked and my plan was to give it as a gift so I emailed PeakPlus about them sending me a new case. The responded quickly saying they were sorry that this happened and would send me a new case with the light and components complete. I stated that I only needed the case but they insisted this was for my inconvenience. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Moojuce

customer_reviews.title: BUY THE BEST AND FORGET THE REST!
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality of the build of the flashlight was superior to most other brands. It was Super bright! What surprised me was that when I put the AAA batteries in, it was as bright as it was with the lithium ion battery. I have never experienced this before! Most of the time when you insert the AAA batteries, it just becomes a regular flashlight. My charger did turn green when the battery was fully charged. The lithium ion battery was obviously of much better quality than what you would expect at this price point. I am thrilled with this flashlight and I will buy again. Happy Jack
customer_reviews.author: happyjack

customer_reviews.title: I would absolutely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: So my twin bought this first and showed it to me in person on a rock climbing trip. I was astounded by the brightness and it’s perfect white light. I bought one for myself when I got home and also bought one for my co worker as a present... he told me he used it the very next day lol. The packaging is also super awesome and it even comes with a battery charger ! And the battery charger is universal and can charge other rechargeable batteries as well!! So two for one lol. Definitely would recommend this to anyone active who could use a flashlight with amazing visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: ... focus/ field diameter of the light beam is a great function. It does take a long time (about ...
customer_reviews.text: This tiny flashlight is the most powerful I have ever owned and the rapid ability to change focus/ field diameter of the light beam is a great function. It does take a long time (about 8 hrs. plus) to charge the battery. The indicator LED on the charger goes from red to green when it is fully charged. You can notice when it needs charging as the brilliance power of the light drops off slowly. Thus its a good idea to keep 3 AAA batteries in the backup holder ( it works great as well). I have purchased two additional ones for friends and they all swear by it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Battery wouldn’t charge
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these and when I went to recharge the battery, only one battery would recharge. Definitely got a bad battery....
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Was Hoping for the Best Versatile Flashlight Ever!
customer_reviews.text: As a Rideshare driver, this is a valuable tool for me. The ability to narrow the powerful light down to a small spotlight allows me to find and see street addresses/house numbers during night time pickups, even from across the street! I use this flashlight nightly! Update: Unfortunately, I struggle with the on/off push button switch. After about 2 weeks of use, the push button switch has broken. This happened to my last one as well. Apparently, my search for the best brand will have to continue.
customer_reviews.author: Cebec

customer_reviews.title: Wow this thing is bright!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have to admit I was not expecting much, just needed a cheep flashlight for work. Well what I got was a great little flashlight that literally will blind you if you're not careful. Came in nice case nothing special but it has it's own case! I rechargeable batterie, a charger and a triple a battery insert. So when I am charging the battery I can still use the flash light. It seems well built but time will tell. I will try and update in 6 months. All in all I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not very durable
customer_reviews.text: If you don't really depend on your flashlights, then this will work fine for you. We live on a boat and if our flashlights are flaky, things can get weird really quickly. I have gone through three of these lights in two years. They are breaking pretty quickly nowadays. And that is without even dropping them or them being old. In the end, it's probably better to drop a few more bucks if you really will depend on the flashlight like we do.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun O.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little flashlight!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific little flashlight. Light enough to carry in your pocket when you're out after dark. Love the charging station; works perfectly. I've given them as gifts to the people who have everything else. The zoom feature comes in real handy when you drop something on the floor and can't find it. Also use it to read menus in dark restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn J.

customer_reviews.title: Bright a f
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first considering this light was only $16.99 but for the price I had nothing to use. Right out of the box, using the charge that was already on the battery, this light is bright a f. I am going to replace the 18650 with a Sony brand battery, just for piece of mind really, but this light goes to work and never comes home. I am beyond impressed. 10/10 in my opinion! The zoom is incredible, the light has a nice weight to it, and the spread is good enough to light up a large room. I couldn’t be happier. Definitely recommend this light to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Koczrowski

customer_reviews.title: The case is sturdy and compact
customer_reviews.text: This is a very bright flashlight. The case is sturdy and compact, and it comes with a charger. You can also use a regular battery pack in a pinch, which is included. I got mine for security. If you shine this in someone s face, they won't see much for a while. It can zero in on anything you wanna see with great detail. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: maha

customer_reviews.title: great light
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my parents at Christmas. They loved the light and I was impressed. Soooo, I got one for myself. Very happy with the light. Adjustable beam and very powerful. Lithium battery is rechargeable. Perfect light.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Super bright compact flashlight
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived within two working days as promised in good condition. Received everything as described and it works great. A little smaller than I thought it would be, but happy with it. It works well with either the lithium ion batteries or the AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: RICK COLETTA

customer_reviews.title: Best Flashlight I own.. I think!
customer_reviews.text: I have $8,000 rotating search lights, I have handhelds that run $400. I also purchased a popular flashlight on amazon for $85. But... I have to admit this one will let you view farther because of the high quality optics. The picture I took is with a "more powerfull" flashlight, that runs $85, but as you can see, look for the little square, that is the beam tightened up on this one, overpowering the more expensive flashlight. This one has a good battery charger Comfortable to use in the hand, the beam expands and contracts easily. High quality battery charger. I hate to say this, but.. this is better than an $85 flashlight I just purchased from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not for professionals, but good for everyone else.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and bought this "tactical" flashlight. It is a cheap imitation of real hunting/military ones, but it is very usable and reasonably priced. The rechargeable battery is quite good. The charger is very flimsy, so handle it gently and expect to play with it to get the changing started. The battery holder will not work unless the batteries you buy have good, long contacts on the + end of the battery. Some batteries are too flat to make a reliable contact. The case is cheap, but strong and very cool-looking. All-in-all, a good deal unless you need something significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: Trusting User

customer_reviews.title: PeakPlus Super Bright LED Tactical Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little flashlight. Battery comes already charged along with a charger and a unit for smaller batteries. Easy to go between modes. I like the fact that it has SOS mode,you never know when you might need that aspect. On high mode it’s incredibly bright which is what I was hoping for. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Kovessy

customer_reviews.title: I ❤️ This Flash Light
customer_reviews.text: I love this flashlight❣️ It has the features that are needed in any situation for an emergency or just getting around in the dark. Flash light is small, light weight and easy to handle. The case is a bonus; which holds the flash light, the charger, the battery case for rechargeable batter which is included as well as the holder for regular batteries. Case fits nicely in center console of car and glove compartment. I’m thinking of getting more because it will make a nice stocking stuffer for next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: but I know they will like it. It is compact and re-chargeable
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for a gift, they haven't opened their birthday present yet, but I know they will like it. It is compact and re-chargeable. With the holster that hasn't arrived yet, it will be very helpful for his long motorcycle rides. I bought one for myself and carry it in my purse. It is very helpful for reading and ordering at restaurants with poor lighting. Also, very helpful for those who have had cataract surgery, because with the best lenses, you need something close to natural light and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the performance
customer_reviews.text: I've been using tactical flashlights for more than 30 yrs. and have to say that this one is a good one. I would recommend this flashlight to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: W. Gunter

customer_reviews.title: GRRRRRRReat
customer_reviews.text: Hello Janelle-Love this flashlight. It will be in my car especially when traveling. I believe I will feel much safer with this flashlight than with pepper spray. I am 80 years old and it is a shame I feel like I have to have protection. Thanks for a great product and thank you for caring.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Steller

customer_reviews.title: Takes a licking and keeps on ticking
customer_reviews.text: I was doing work on the inside of my oven, changing out a sensor where I needed the light. When I was done, I wanted to check to verify my repair was completed correctly. I set the oven to 450 and walked away for like 20 min. Checked the oven and saw I left the flashlight inside of it. Flashlight still works and you can barely tell it had been baked for 20 minutes. Minor melting. Took a licking and is still ticking
customer_reviews.author: Ravens Fan

customer_reviews.title: one for me and a friend and we love it as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flashlight for my son who works snow removal in the Sierra on the midnight shift. Previous flashlights failed and did not provide the bright adjustable beam of light needed to warn on-coming motorist of the checkpoint. He loves it! I bought another two units, one for me and a friend and we love it as well. Comes in a hard shell plastic case along with a battery, charger, and a AAA battery holder for a second power source. We have had these about a week so I cannot vouch for durability. I have purchased several brands of small flashlights and all have a problem with the on/off switch. I'll review again in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: xgnslngr

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight! Worth the cost...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and it's very bright! It does everything is says, so far. One down side is the rechargeable battery takes a very long time to charge, about 6 hours. Plus side it comes with an adapter for 3 AAA batteries to run off of as well. Another thing I noticed was the plastic tube that you use with the rechargeable battery inside the flashlight moves around and makes noise when you shake the flashlight, slightly annoying. The zoom is awesome and can focus the beam very tight so you can see things very far away. Totally worth the buy out of box, I'll update when I get some use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This light works perfectly for all applications. Hi low and medium brightness options are a great bonus. Many times you just need a little light but not your highbeam it's nice to have that ability. The supplied charger and battery worked perfectly. Tried it with the AAA option and it also performed well. The case makes it really nice to store the accessories along with some back up batteries if needed. Hoping to use this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.Badger

customer_reviews.title: I love this flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I love this flashlight. I carry it with the attached string / rope and most flashlights unscrew and fall apart from my travels with my dogs. I keep waiting to be chasing parts down the sidewalk or grass. No problems at all and I have not even thought about re charging it until this email came up. The battery has lasted for over a month of daily use. It is bright and sturdy. I would recommend this for anyone. My brother in law liked how the light condensed with a twist and he could look into the trees. He was finally impressed.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This one is a good purchase. I've tried to find other flashlights like this one and they didn't measure up this one is a quality flashlight and a very good buy great price great product very durable and easy to use. I need to get more of these for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Adams

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great, inexpensive extra flashlight
customer_reviews.text: A good buy for the money. Comes in a case, but I can't see using that much. I like the fact that you get a rechargeable lithium battery at this price. You could also opt to use three AAA batteries with the enclosed battery holder. At the current price of batteries, I don't know why you would. The fact that you can choose a wide or narrow beam of light is the best feature here. When made as narrow as possible it gives you one of those square blocks of light. Overall pretty well built and nice to have around the house. One can never have too many flashlights.
customer_reviews.author: Guy McCardle Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to all dog walkers!
customer_reviews.text: So bright and adjustable. Everyone who comes over to my house in the evening when we walk the dogs ask about the light. For the price, hard to beat. The spot shines for several hundred meters and is very precise. Very hard line due to the lens, so it's bright and even "in" the light, and dark as heck beyond that line. Comfortable to hold in the extended or short position. Have never ran the battery dead, and we use ours almost every night to walk the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Hager

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father in law for Christmas and also snagged one for my husband, just in case, it was an awesome buy! We opened my father in laws and tested it out to make sure it worked before giving it to him and my husband said, "I think I'll keep this and get his something else!" I made him give it to him and he was excited Christmas morning when he got one also. We bought a light similar to this off of Ebay a few years back. We paid over $100 for it! It works amazing but it's exactly like this one but a little smaller and so much cheaper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M.

customer_reviews.title: Compact Brightness
customer_reviews.text: The brightness level of this compact flashlight is more than adequate for the uses I would generally use it for. Once I got used to the sliding focus I found I could easily adjust to suit my needs. Although I doubt I'd use either the strobe or SOS feature except in an emergency, it would be nice to have these features as an alternate option separate from the 3 level push button so you don't have to cycle through them from the lowest lumen setting. I found the square shape of the light pattern to be somewhat distracting and prefer a more rounded pattern, but that is something I will probably also become accustomed to as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Nemier

customer_reviews.title: Super Flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a flashlight for my toolbag that I keep in the truck. This one does everything I need and the case protects it from getting damaged by my tools. I love that it comes with a rechargeable battery and charger, plus have the option of using AAA batteries while it's charging if I needed to. They really have thought of everything! This was a gift from my wife but she also said that it arrived sooner than originally promised. Overall I'm thoroughly happy with this set. Thank you, Louis DeFalco
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne De Falco

customer_reviews.title: Identical to Another Brand
customer_reviews.text: This is identical to a Binwo flashlight that I recently received in a 2 pack for $19.99 obviously made by the same manufacturer. It is not a superior one as the description implies. I have no problem so far with the Binwo and it is good for a moderately priced flashlight. However, if you want this, buy the Binwo and you can get to by only paying an additional $2.00.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I use this item daily in crawlspaces. Much easier to move around with than the large mag light I had and it produces plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Industrial grade and e=dependable.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and as promised. I've had one before and knew it was a good item. I was pleasantly surprised by the additional items. (Rechargeable batteries and charger. Back up AAA battery holder. Case) I work as a Corrections Officer and some of my colleagues have spent a couple of hundred dollars or more for similar products. I ordered a second unit for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be the exact same flashlight as lesser brands
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light looking to add an additional tactical light to my Streamlight flashlights I use outdoors. This light comes in a case with charger. It comes across as cheap looking in the very cheap case. IMO this light looks and performs much more like the brands you get two for the price of one than it comes across as a Streamlight or Fenix. It zooms to narrow the beam by sliding the hood, giving you the square when fully zoomed. I didn't use it for my intended purchase but I am using it as my go-to house flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: HiSticking

customer_reviews.title: PeakPlus review
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the flashlight and the quality of the flashlight. When I recieved the flashlight it was somehow turned on in shipping, it was very hot and the packing material was hot as well. But the flashlight was still on, and was and still is working fine. I was contacted by customer service concerning the shipping issue. Yes I would recommend the flashlight and the company.
customer_reviews.author: L. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: I recommended this product for any one who wants a really ...
customer_reviews.text: I recommended this product for any one who wants a really strong flash light for any purpose. It is extremely bright and my favorite part is that it can turn into a beam or a wide spotlight. The battery does take a while to charge but it is worth it. I honestly think the price is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Flashlight - Already Love it
customer_reviews.text: I received my flashlight today and used it for the first time walking the dog tonight. It is perfect for this. I love how bright it is and I can zoom in and out. I have rather large hands so I like the nice weighted feel of this light. It is comfortable in my hand. I particularly appreciated the extra effort the seller took in sending me a link to a printable user's manual. You won't be disappointed with this light
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: No more feeling around the ground with my hand stuffed in a plastic bag---PeakPlus Super Bright LED Tactical Flashlight gives me superhuman Poop Vision
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes to poop at night. This flashlight can illuminate his stinky stools from a mile away! No more feeling around the ground with my hand stuffed in a plastic bag---PeakPlus Super Bright LED Tactical Flashlight gives me superhuman Poop Vision! Sure, a regular flashlight could probably do the same thing, but this one also allows me to project my custom Poopman symbol onto the sides of houses while my dog is taking his massive dumps. (It's kind of like the Batman symbol, but instead of wings, it has stink lines.) I love this flashlight!
customer_reviews.author: R. Shiffrar

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good but not to practical .
customer_reviews.text: To be fair... The light is well build and Quality is ok. What I did not realise is that you can't recharge it just by plugging in a cable. You always need to remove the battery and recharge it separately. Since you only get one battery you can't use it while charging. Ok, they provide an adapter where you have to add 3 x AAA batteries . unfortunately that adapter option is not working with 3 rechargeable AAA as the voltage for those are to low.
customer_reviews.author: Florian

customer_reviews.title: Same as others.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize it at the time of purchase but this is is the same "flashlight" from several other Mfgs. (I already had 2!) Usually costs $8-10 but this has a rechargeable battery. The case is a waste of plastic and I tossed mine in the garbage. They should try to help the Earth out a bit by not offering it...LOL
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Meh...It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: The light works okay. Not terrible, but not any better than a cheap light from Walmart. My biggest complaint is the plastic case that comes with it. It doesn't want to lock shut and I often find it open and the contents spread all over by the cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was it.
customer_reviews.text: This tactical flashlight has all the features and performance I was looking for. I wanted a relatively small, high performing,strongly built flashlight that I could fit in my pocket and will serve my purposes for many years. This was it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Moss

customer_reviews.title: Very bright the battery lasts a long time plus you can use disposables would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flashlight super bright it has a square shape when you bring it in close. The rechargeable battery lasts a long time the only negative thing about it is that I wish it was a USB plug-in instead of a wall plug-in that way you could use a battery charger pack or some thing if you needed to or charge it in your car. Other than the battery charger being wall outlet only no complaints great flashlight and super bright. Don’t know how long the bulbs will last so we will see so far so good a few months later.
customer_reviews.author: Dabloesco

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot of flashlight for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and weight of the flashlight. I love that it came with a rechargeable battery and charger along with a carrier/adapter that allows you to substitute 3 standard AAA's. Pretty cool how the flashlight zooms in for a focused tight beam or it can be collapsed to provide a wider light. The only additional item I wish it had was a strobe button. But that's not a deal breaker. I am extremely satisfied with my new light.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The description gives you the impression that this is a 1000 lumen light. It's not. But it is bright. With the zoomable beam, it's bright enough for most needs. It takes a while for it to charge. So if you're in a hurry, get another light! Everything like the carry case, charger, and the flash light, seem well made. And I would for sure buy another if I needed one. I don't see where you can go wrong with this light. I could care less about all the functions it has. A bright flash light was what I wanted, and got.
customer_reviews.author: over the hill

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Nice light. In a crowded field of competitors, I might suggest that you provide some scientific proof of the lumen output. It would just help techies such as myself feel that we've made a competent choice. Arrived in perfect shape with all the goodies promised. I gave it as a gift, and I am waiting to see if it is as bright as advertised after a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: Light of lights!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ideal light for me. Small and compact but puts out the light of a flashlight 5 times its size! The adjustable light is also a big plus. It goes from super wide to a powerful laser square for long distance. Sturdy material was used to make this thing and feels bulletproof. I also like the fact that it comes with a battery, case, and an accessory that allows you to use 3 AAA batteries if you would like. It's a great little light and I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Seems good, but time will tell.....
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight is fine, and I bought some extra batteries. I like the idea of using the Lithium Ion instead of the rechargeable MaH AAA’s that I have. They use up fairly quickly. But, time will tell whether thes Li Ion batteries are worth the investment. The charger seems to work, but it also seems fairly cheaply made. I also bought another charger with my extra batteries. One thing that concerns me are the latches on the case that comes with the flashlight. The seem like they’ll break fairly quickly. Again, time will tell. Hence, four stars rather than five.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A.

customer_reviews.title: Small with Large bright light!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful flashlight. Compact, lightweight, wide to pinpoint field of range and bright. You can really see things clearly with this. Wish I had one before rather than relying on the "old" regular flashlights that you needed to be big in order to give a somewhat decent light. I can carry this in my jean's pocket or my purse. Liked it so well gave one to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: coast watcher

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Bright Light!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product came with various ways to power the battery, and that it had a good case to put the flashlight and it's counterparts in. The brightness of the flashlight was powerful, and AWESOME. I have no complaints or negative comments on the appearance of or how this product works. Definitely recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight. Only problem is it's not one inch ...
customer_reviews.text: Great flashlight. Only problem is it's not one inch diameter flashlight it's 1.1 inches will not fit in my tactical flashlight holder for my AR. So those of you looking for a flashlight for your AR this will not fit. You guys need to make a 1-inch diameter flashlight nobody else does
customer_reviews.author: steven bieniek

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flashlight. The light is bright, I like the option for a rechargeable battery or AAA batteries, and the adjustable focus on the light. The one drawback is actually on the focus. Once you've adjusted the focus you cannot set it down or you'll have to readjust it. I always set my light face down, but it's in this position that causes it to need readjustment. I love everything else about it.
customer_reviews.author: JodiLynn

customer_reviews.title: charging light
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent flashlight for the money! Battery life is great and the adjustable beam works perfectly. however, the charger is a little strange. I put the battery in the charger and the indicator turns green. i assume that means the battery is good to go,but when i plug the charger into the wall the light turns red. I left the battery plugged in overnight and the light was still red the next morning. the battery had plenty of charge but im not sure if the charger is working properly
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey a.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I give it a full five stars. It's a solid flashlight that doesn't feel cheap, but also didn't cost a lot. II bought two and they both had a charge in the included battery when I opened them up. One had a little less juice than the other, but I installed both batteries, turned the flashlights on, and let them drain the batteries. It took almost a full 24 hours to drain completely, but I'd say they would have been unusable after maybe 12-14 hours of being on. I'll update if this change, but for now, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Very good light.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these lights , The first one i purchased about a year ago. It has been flawless,best flashlight i ever owned.I bought two more recently .For some reason the last two seem to be a lot looser when you move the body in and out to move from spot to flood mode, seems like they be missing a inner seal or something. The lights work very well otherwise. Very bright, still a very good light.
customer_reviews.author: pvpagpap

customer_reviews.title: First class product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, very bright, from a first class company. A good friend purchased another flashlight, which he was bragging about, for over $100.00. I like mine better. You can run over his with a car. I have never run over one of my flashlights with a car, and don't intend to. I don't know if mine can be run over with a car, but I don't intend to find out. Mine is just as bright as his and costs many times less.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this flashlight!! It's bright and the modes are great. I've used it for everything from walking home in dark to finding lost objects under the couch. I like how the beam adjusts from full to the narrow beam at great distances. PeakPlus emailed twice to see if I liked the flashlight and if I had any problems. I first used the AAA batteries, then tried the lithium which came fully charged. Both methods worked great. Great product. Great company. I showed it to my neighbor who is a Boy Scout leader and he told his wife to get him one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: forestburghguy

customer_reviews.title: Bright and long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought on of these flashlights about a year ago and it has been absolutely awesome. I use it as work and as en EDC. I recently bought three more for my vehicle, my wife’s vehicle and one for her EDC. The battery lasts forever and the brightness is unbelievable. I’ll probably get a few more for Christmas stocking stuffers. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: Best flashlight made
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing light I have ever purchased! I was so impressed I bought both of my grown children one a piece. As a matter of fact my daughter was locked out of her apartment last night by her 12 yr old Son, he did not hear her knocking on the door so she went in back of her apartment and shined the light in his room through the blinds and he came to open the door, thanks to that awesome light! Love it and recommend to anyone thinking about buying that high dollar tax light, save your money and get this, thank you for your wonderful light
customer_reviews.author: Betty Hockemeier

customer_reviews.title: Bright and durable flashlight
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight is solid and bright. It has accommodation for one rechargeable battery (included) and an adapter for three conventional batteries. The head slides to focus the beam. During a blackout, I set the flashlight on its end, set the focus to wide, and had enough light in the room to function for several hours until power was restored. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. G

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my new light.
customer_reviews.text: This Tac Light is everthing the ad said it is. I always read the customer reviews before purchasing. The case is a little cheap, but not a problem. Comes with lithium ion battery and charger. Surprisingly, took about 16 hours to charge, and after several days, appears to be holding the charge. Super bright light, and for pinpoint distance, just push the head forward. Law enforcement/military grade performance.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality light
customer_reviews.text: Knocked off a star because the plastic case is really cheap, which is admittedly an excessive penalty when reviewing a flashlight - but it is unfortunately less than perfect due to that. But the light is quite bright with a focusable beam, the battery lasts, and the charger works just fine. It's a winner in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Zullo

customer_reviews.title: nice for spotting the bears that haven't bedded down for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are almost alarmingly bright. I can light up the neighbors whole yard, nice for spotting the bears that haven't bedded down for the winter yet. We are flashlight buffs and have an assorted collection, and this is the brightest yet by far. We've only used it for a few days, since it was a stocking stuffer for Christmas, so I have yet to test its longevity. The latches on the little box are just plastic tabs and we broke one already. I'm anxious to see how well the rechargeable batteries work, but we did try it out with both the rechargeable and regular batteries and it works great with either.
customer_reviews.author: Past Midlife and OK with It

customer_reviews.title: Impressive flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flashlight as a gift for my husband. He absolutely loves it! It has been so handy. We've used it to light up plumbing projects under sinks and to check out the wildlife in our back yard at night. The light is incredible. I think it's an excellent value for the price. Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: M Lane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality / Reasonably Priced
customer_reviews.text: This is an affordable light that is well constructed. I have dropped this light several times and drops had no impact on its performance. The battery can take up to 12-hours to charge. The goods news is that it come with a triple-A battery adapter. So you can run regular batteries while waiting on the charge finish. I will be purchasing 1 to 2 more just to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Joby65

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is a great improvement on any one I've ever had before. The beam is strong and bright. I use a power wheelchair and on occasion go up the street to my mailbox after dark. It lets me see more clearly and makes me more visible to drivers. The strobe and SOS will definitely attract attention. And all of that in a comfortable hand sized and affordable unit. I love that it came with a both a battery holder and a lithium battery and charger.
customer_reviews.author: ELK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flashlight
customer_reviews.text: The photos of how bright this light is appeared fake (in the ad), but other features prompted me to take a chance. When you turn it on, the light-pattern is an 'exact' circle, & very bright! When you 'telescope' (extend) the end, the circle of light narrows drastically to a small square, extremely bright! It also features a 'strobe' light, &, of course, a setting that flashes "S-O-S". (my newest 'toy') Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mile High

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED A+++++ I would give this prouduct a 10 Star if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Good powerful light, the charging station is great. These batteries have a chip that will not let them discharge too far, and they can be recharged 500 times. It is a common rechargeable size and is well worth the money. I give these as gifts to everyone in the family from my 90 year old Mother, to nephews and nieces. Keep one in the car, one in the tool box. Very nice for the money 🏁 🏁 🏁 🏁 🏁 RECOMMENDED VOTE thumbs UP IF YOU FOUND THIS HELPFUL
customer_reviews.author: DaPoppa1

customer_reviews.title: Quality LED
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the packaging, as flashlight comes in its own plastic case. Charging the battery took the required 8 hours. Main thing is my wife likes it. She keeps it on her nightstand when she gets up in the middle of the night. I just hope this light is as durable as my Ruimx flashlight, as have had it 4 years, and still works great, as does the rechargeable battery. Ruimx is no longer offered on Amazon. This PeakPlus looks almost identical, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Ray

product_meta.title: PeakPlus Rechargeable Tactical Flashlight LFX1000 (18650 Battery and Charger Included) - High Lumens LED, Super Bright, Zoomable, 5 Modes, Water Resistant - Best Camping, Emergency Flashlights
product_meta.description:
Brightest, High Power, Handheld Tactical LED Flashlight - Value-for-money, heavy duty Ultra Bright Flashlight with high intensity brightness and range. This is the best flashlight tool for outdoor activities, emergency, camping, hiking, fishing, home and car breakdowns.

Features:

• Powerful LED with max output when used with rechargeable battery

• Aluminum alloy lamp body to withstand abrasion and shock.

• Zoom allows adjustable focus

• Soft-touch Tail Switch allows on/off mode and switching between 5 light modes

Specification:

• LED: Professional LED

• Flashlight Material: Aluminum Alloy

• Beam Range: 200 to 500 meters

• Zoom: x1, x250, x500, x1000, x2000

• Dimensions: 5.3"(L) x 1.6" (Head) x 1.1" (Body) (6.10" Extended length)

• Brightness Dimming Modes: Full, Medium, Low, Strobe, SOS

• Battery Type: 1 x 2200mAh Rechargeable Battery (included) OR 3 x AAA Batteries (not included)

• Charging Time: 6-12 Hours (Approx)

• Rated Output: 10W

PeakPlus Kit Includes:

• 1 x Super Bright Zoomable Adjustable Focus Tactical Flashlight (Tac Light)

• 1 x AAA Battery Holder

• 1 x Battery Sleeve (For Use With Rechargeable Battery)


• 1 x Battery Charger


• 1 x Rechargeable Battery (3.7V)

• 1 x Green Case

• 1 x User Manual

100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee:

ONE-YEAR MONEY BACK WARRANTY

If you are not 100% satisfied with the purchase, please contact us for a replacement/refund.

NOTICE: PeakPlus is the exclusive brand owner and only seller of all PeakPlus products.

If you purchase your product from other sellers, they are not identical to ours and we will not offer any warranty.
feature_bullets: FULL FLASHLIGHT KIT: 1 Super Bright Tactical LED Flashlight, 1 Rechargeable Battery and Sleeve, 1 Battery Charger, 1 Case, 1 AAA Battery Holder and 1 User Manual (Suitable As A Present/Gift)
HIGH POWER BRIGHTNESS: High Lumens LED makes our flashlight 10 times brighter than old incandescent flashlights. Runs on either a rechargeable battery or 3 AAA batteries.

HEAVY DUTY: Water resistant, anti-abrasive, skid proof, compact design makes it the top pocket flashlight for all situations, outdoor activities, camping, hiking, fishing, home use and as a powerful emergency light.

5 LIGHT MODES & ZOOM FUNCTION: Full, Medium, Low Brightness, Strobe & SOS. Adjustable focus as a spotlight that throws an intense beam of light up to 600 feet ahead or small floodlight that illuminates a wide area.

ONE-YEAR WARRANTY: We here at PeakPlus want our clients to be happy, so if you feel disappointed with your choice, we guarantee to give your money back instantly within one year. Get your tactical flashlight kit TODAY!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
